'''''Rave In2 the Joy Fantastic''''' is a [[remix album]] by [[Prince (musician)|Prince]] (his stage name at that time being the unpronounceable symbol [[File:Prince logo.svg|12px]]), released via mail exclusively through the [[NPG Music Club]], an [[Internet]] subscription service, on 29 April, 2000. The album is a remix of ''[[Rave Un2 the Joy Fantastic]]'', released the previous year.
+
'''''Rave In2 the Joy Fantastic''''' is a [[remix album]] by [[Prince (musician)|Prince]] (his stage name at that time being an unpronounceable symbol), released via mail exclusively through the [[NPG Music Club]], an [[Internet]] subscription service, on 29 April, 2000. The album is a remix of ''[[Rave Un2 the Joy Fantastic]]'', released the previous year.
The album makes a number of alterations to its predecessor. Five tracks ("Rave In2 the Joy Fantastic", "Undisputed (The Moneyappolis Mix)", "[[The Greatest Romance Ever Sold]]", "Hot Wit U (Nasty Girl Remix)" and "Man'O'War (Remix)") have been remixed or had substantial musical elements added. Seven tracks ("So Far, So Pleased", "I Love U, but I Don't Trust U Anymore", "Silly Game", "Whatever U Do, Wherever U Go", "The Sun, the Moon and Stars", "Tangerine" and "Prettyman") are mostly unchanged, save for slightly longer tag endings, or extended jams at the end of a song (
The album makes a number of alterations to its predecessor. Five tracks ("Rave In2 the Joy Fantastic", "Undisputed (The Moneyappolis Mix)", "[[The Greatest Romance Ever Sold]]", "Hot Wit U (Nasty Girl Remix)" and "Man'O'War (Remix)") have been remixed or had substantial musical elements added.
